content_lines: At iCodeGuru (registered in California, USA) we're focused on a mission to uplift promising talent from underprivileged areas and help them reach their full potential in the tech sector.

We collaborate with top Silicon Valley talent to offer extensive training, mentorship, and direction. This empowers our students with the cutting-edge skills and industry acumen needed to secure prestigious careers at leading tech companies.

Beyond immediate employment, we empower our students with the entrepreneurial spirit and experience required to become future industry leaders. They graduate not only as highly talented engineers and diligent developers but also with the confidence and ability to start their own successful ventures.
